name: Slash Slash Clean
description:
Slash Slash Clean is a hack n’ slash game where you control a character known as the Chosen One, who stumbles upon a magical talking sword obsessed with cleanliness. In the game you, together with your nagging sword, must make your way through the once prosperous elven kingdom that fell into the hands of  a greater evil. That greater evil is known as the Raven Lord who seized control of the kingdom along with his minions.

Your goal is to slash your way through the Raven Lord's minions in a procedurally generated castle and end his tyranny, but you can only do so if you manage to keep your magical companion clean and happy.

 

Developed by a team of 13 students from FutureGames
